list.name: Default
list.comment: New release - 0.3.07 Forgot to change version in framework descriptors!

task.summary: Default task
Intellij IDEA changes
Adjusted CSS for contextual info Added all places to contextual info Java class

Changed contextual info to handle PROPERTY_EDIT_QUALIFIED in StylesFilter
Started the facsimiles package
Created new toolbars Tweaked CSS further Groundwork for Facsimile
Added Tika and integrated with build Fixed pathing issues in build.xml
Fixed Contextual Info to only appy to block elements Tons of tweaks to CSS Further dev on Facsimile
Fixed Contextual Info to only appy to block elements Tons of tweaks to CSS Further dev on Facsimile
Add UniqueAttributes recgnition and generation combined CSS back into one big file
Add UniqueAttributes recgnition and generation combined CSS back into one big file
Add UniqueAttributes recgnition and generation combined CSS back into one big file
Added SelectFacsDir Operation Tweaked CSS
Add UniqueAttributes recgnition and generation combined CSS back into one big file

Synchronized reload() and refresh() on contextualInfo so Oxygen gets the values at startup Fixed line break in Oxygen so @break works as defined Added @force dialog box to punctuation action in Oxygen
Lots of progress on Facsimile - will soon have operations implemented
Couple of tweaks, before I sleep ;-)
open media is working!
added genre to contextual info
cleanup - with NPE on Windows platform for a FileWatcher
totally refactored ContextualInfo!!!! Added Apache commons VFS2 to monitor files for changes (Java Watch framework wouldn't work on Windows)
totally refactored ContextualInfo!!!! Added Apache commons VFS2 to monitor files for changes (Java Watch framework wouldn't work on Windows)
totally refactored ContextualInfo!!!! Added Apache commons VFS2 to monitor files for changes (Java Watch framework wouldn't work on Windows)
totally refactored ContextualInfo!!!! Added Apache commons VFS2 to monitor files for changes (Java Watch framework wouldn't work on Windows)
Removed watcher package

Fixed Build system with Ant - Only sources are compiled to jar and linked to new 'lib' directory in frameworks directory - Ant copies the jars from the main 'lib' folder to frameworks - Oxygen then loads these as part of the class paths loaded in the options - Added extra build.xml file for frameworks
Further work on Facsimile
Further work on Facsimile
Restructuring EMSTUtils - first stage Changed EMSTUtils to EMSTOxygenUtils
Restructuring EMSTUtils - second stage Created new EMSTUtils to hold generic helper functions Migrated generic functions to new class
Restructuring EMSTUtils Added private constructor to new EMSTUtils class
Added Guava library - haven't used it yet Added emptyToNull() function Added static imports to Utils Modules for shorter code
Added Guava jars to subversion
Renamed oxygen library to include version (15.2)
Further tweaks to make more use of Utils
Further work on updating nodes under facsimile
Ton of work on Facsimile - almost got it working! Wow! It's been a big 'un!
Major work on the Facsimile functionality - it now reads the base directory and creates elements for media files it finds! Yay! - Lots of refactoring and cleanup
Tweaked CSS for Facsimile Added new icons and refreshed all others - just made them bigger so they're easier to see
Added a bunch of new icons Added supplied, punctuation.supplied, div, div.entry, div.address Tweaked all author actions so ${caret} is placed properly Tweaked CSS Much, much more ;-)
Added Custom Node Renderer to Oygen extensions Added a bunch of icons for those nodes

Customized ContextualInfo to segment the lists by type Changed the actions and templates to reflect new config Figured out how to create a combobox to ask users for the node name - I used this to create one action to create all the places: district, settlement, etc. - yippee!!!!
Added icon for repository node :-)
Refactored ContextualInfo and created new EventDispatcher framework :-)
Fixed bug in casting URLs to Paths - caused issues on windows Restructured EMST Menus to match toolbars Added letter template
Fixed Bug where space in file names wouldn't allow media to be opened
Moved contextual_info templates into their own directory

Changed Facsimile so if same directory is given, it just doesn't update it rather than throw and error This allows user to still refresh nodes in same directory Fixed issue with Contextual Element - wasn't initiating the CSS in Oxygen because it returned a valid object only if AuthorPage was also available - now it just waits till it's available and sets it on later calls to get()

Added handShift and created new hand Action for adding handNotes, which now allow linking to people or just typing a description Setup CCFilter to create entries for all @hand and the handShift element
Removed EMSTContextualSettings - realized it could easily be combined with EMSTContextualType Enum - just added FileName to the properties and changed the one place in the code that used it :-)
Ummm, forgot to commit for a while now, so lots and lots o' changes (for the better of course)!

Major restructuring of the CSS into modular files It was way too slow with all CSS in a single file Also converted all CSS over to i18n functions, so all labels are now in translations.xml file added icon for label updated css for fields added by Amsterdam converstion
Lots of fixes and tweaks for release of Amsterdam framework
Added rest of special chars for EMST Added icons for lists, events, relations, bibls
Implemented my own CCFilter functionality - seems to be quicker, but still a bit sluggish
Fixed refresh error with ContextualInfo
Adding Dist folder to SVN
Fixed problem with values not showing up in SchemaLists at startup by implementing synchronized blocks Fixed TEIHeader issues with ContextualInfo
Maded basic labels a bit wider to accommodate Settlement
Restyled contextual info records with colors as with other foldable sections elsewhere
Added MIT License Releasin new Dist for Mo to test - version 0.3.03
Tweaked my name in License Added Transcriber Added some stuff for titlePages
Build for next version
Build for next version

Converted :hover to :focus for most elements Tweaked visual stuff for this as well - borders and more padding for hover operations Set Java compiler version to 1.7 to see if it helps installations on Mac (which is apparently difficult to upgrade to the latest Java patch release)
Few more CSS tweaks before release
Configured Oxygen descriptor file with HTML for release notes/what's new
Build for next version
finished automating Amsterdam build process by copying files from EMST Moved Framework descriptor files to frameworks directory and then copy them in the build
Results of building EMST
Test build
Edited Amsterdam descriptor for new release
Amsterdam - new release with hover removed along with a few bug fixes and CSS tweaks This will be version 0.3.05 for both frameworks
-Updated Amsterdam templates -Moved UniqueAttributesRecognizer to extensions sub-package
-Finished fixing Amsterdam templates -Added more fields to teiHeader for Amsterdam -Fixed small bug where media elements were not being updated if empty Facsimile element was present beforehand

-Added actions to insert opener, closer, postscript, and respStmt -Added resp icons -Added resp icon to respStmt for Outline view -Added @key attrib on resp to MediaSchemaLists -Edited descriptors for new release
Forgot to add icon files to SVN
added @break to <pb> elements
Tweaked look of <pb> elements
New release - 0.3.07 - Changed background-color on abbr to differentiate from expan more clearly
New release - 0.3.07 Forgot to change version in framework descriptors!
